title: Emaiya raama
sahitya:
Emayya rAma brahmEndrAdulaku naina

nImAya teliya vashamA shrI rAma 

(Emayya)



anupallavi



kAmAri vinuta guNadhama kuvalayadaLa

shyAmA nanuganna taNDri shri rAma 

(Emayya)



caraNam 1



sutuDanucu dasharathuDu hituDanucu sughrIvuDu

atibaluNDanucu kapulu -- kSitinAthuDanucu

bhUpatulu kolicirigAni patita pAnanuDanucu

mati teliyalErayiri  

(Emayya)



caraNam 2



celikADanucu pANDavulu virOdiDancuyanala

jarAsandAdulu -- galavADani kucElunDu

nerigirigAni -- jalajAkSuDani ninnu

sEvimpalerayiri 

(Emayya)



caraNam 3



naruDavani naruladama doravanucu yAdhavulu

varuDanucu gOpa satulu -- karivarad bhadrAdri puranilaya

rAmadAsa paramAtmuDani ninnu bhAvincalerayiri 

(Emayya)
